languages.text: "Дежурный доложил, что почтенный проктор направился в трюмы с инспекцией. Я уже направил курьеров, но пока они его найдут..."
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!

languages.text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!
languages.original_text: "Дежурный доложил, что почтенный проктор направился в трюмы с инспекцией. Я уже направил курьеров, но пока они его найдут..."

"The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

languages.text: "Laut Offizier vom Dienst wollte der geschätzte Proktor eine Inspektion des Frachtraums vornehmen. Ich habe bereits Botengänger zu ihm geschickt, aber bis sie ihn finden ..."
languages.original_text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

traits.locale_text: "Laut Offizier vom Dienst wollte der geschätzte Proktor eine Inspektion des Frachtraums vornehmen. Ich habe bereits Botengänger zu ihm geschickt, aber bis sie ihn finden ..."

languages.text: « L'officier de quart a dit avoir vu l'honorable proctor se rendre dans la cale pour y effectuer une inspection. J'ai déjà envoyé des ordonnances le chercher, mais en attendant... »
languages.original_text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

traits.locale_text: « L'officier de quart a dit avoir vu l'honorable proctor se rendre dans la cale pour y effectuer une inspection. J'ai déjà envoyé des ordonnances le chercher, mais en attendant... »

languages.text: 「当直士官によれば、尊敬すべき代理人が検査のために貨物庫へ向かうのを目撃したとのことです。すでに使いの者を捜索に向かわせましたが、見つかるまでは…」
languages.original_text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

traits.locale_text: 「当直士官によれば、尊敬すべき代理人が検査のために貨物庫へ向かうのを目撃したとのことです。すでに使いの者を捜索に向かわせましたが、見つかるまでは…」

languages.text: «El oficial de guardia afirma que el Procurador se dirigía a la bodega de carga para una inspección. He enviado mensajeros a buscarlo, pero hasta que lo traigan...».
languages.original_text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

traits.locale_text: «El oficial de guardia afirma que el Procurador se dirigía a la bodega de carga para una inspección. He enviado mensajeros a buscarlo, pero hasta que lo traigan...».

languages.text: “值班军官报告说，他看到尊敬的监察官前往货舱进行检查。我已经派人去找他了，但恐怕得花些时间……”
languages.original_text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

traits.locale_text: “值班军官报告说，他看到尊敬的监察官前往货舱进行检查。我已经派人去找他了，但恐怕得花些时间……”

languages.text: "Görevli subay, saygıdeğer Üsteğmen'i en son teftiş amacıyla ambarlar civarında gördüğünü bildirdi. Peşinden ulakları gönderdim ama o gelene kadar..."
languages.original_text: "The duty officer reported seeing the esteemed Proctor heading off to the holds to carry out an inspection. I have already dispatched runners to find him, but until they do..."

traits.locale_text: "Görevli subay, saygıdeğer Üsteğmen'i en son teftiş amacıyla ambarlar civarında gördüğünü bildirdi. Peşinden ulakları gönderdim ama o gelene kadar..."
